response.original_title: A Bit of Matter and A Little Bit More
response.overview: The male/female, subject/object investigation in A Bit of Matter and a Little Bit More has no titillating introduction; the appetite is not whetted beforehand. Hardcore, the opening shot, shows the crotch areas of a male and female body engaged in coitus. At the end of the tape a male voice says, "Some questions and five answers relative to moved pictures, five questions and some answers relative to moved picturesâ€”" a reference to the artists' book, 100 Rocks on a Wall.
response.title: A Bit of Matter and A Little Bit More
